page.title: 03Rayleigh-Migration
page.content: From our survey,we discovered that: 96% of the adult population have moved here, and 4% have always lived here. Of the 96%,12% came from London,and 53% from areas in Essex.This was the first home for 24% of the people.Of the rest,34% came from London,31% from areas in Essex,and 15% from the Midlands and the South.Of the people who moved to Rayleigh,29% moved because of work,and 27% moved because they married.of the 4% who have always lived here,50% have moved around,but 50% have stayed in the same house. 98% of the adult population like living here for a variety of reasons, including being near the country and coast,and the distance from London.The other 2% dislike Rayleigh because of the people and a lack of amenities.
